code: @Override public void add(DeleteRequest... deleteRequests) {     for (DeleteRequest deleteRequest : deleteRequests) {         if (flushOnCheckpoint) {             numPendingRequestsRef.getAndIncrement().         }         this.bulkProcessor.add(deleteRequest).     } }
